response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed to provide unparalleled benefits and functionality. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. For this opportunity, I am proposing a price of $18,000. I understand that value perception can vary, so if this figure aligns with your assessment of the product's worth, I would be delighted to proceed with the transaction. If you have any concerns or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
